posts.post_content:
My T206 number is up to 14 (all Detroit Tigers). I won my shop's NFL football pool this past week ($80) so I thought I would try to add on to my T206 Tiger collection. Does anyone have the following for sale:

Need all three Jennings
Kilian (throwing)
Mullen (throwing)
Mullen (batting)
Schafer (fielding)
Schmidt (throwing)
Stranage
Summers
Crawford (throwing)
Crawford (batting)

Most of mine are raw with creases (cards with character). I do need all 4 Ty Cobb cards but I think I might have to win all 16 weeks of my football pool to get one of these :D  

Jim
